name.baseName: Brick production ; concrete pavement brick ; Curing process
砖生产 ; 混凝土路面砖 ; 固化工艺

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: The concrete pavement bricks produced in this process are primarily used for constructing durable road surfaces and pedestrian paths. They are suitable for various outdoor applications including public squares, parking lots, and urban road systems. The inclusion of permeable bricks allows for better water management, making the surfaces more environmentally friendly by reducing runoff and facilitating groundwater recharge.
在此工艺中生产的混凝土路面砖主要用于建设耐用的道路表面和人行道。它们适用于包括公共广场、停车场和城市道路系统在内的各种户外应用。透水砖的使用可以更好地管理水资源，通过减少径流和促进地下水补给，使表面更加环保。

quantitativeReference.functionalUnitOrOther: The functional unit is the area of 1 m2 brick products.

technology.technologicalApplicability: The concrete pavement bricks produced in this process are primarily used for constructing durable road surfaces and pedestrian paths. They are suitable for various outdoor applications including public squares, parking lots, and urban road systems. The inclusion of permeable bricks allows for better water management, making the surfaces more environmentally friendly by reducing runoff and facilitating groundwater recharge.
在此工艺中生产的混凝土路面砖主要用于建设耐用的道路表面和人行道。它们适用于包括公共广场、停车场和城市道路系统在内的各种户外应用。透水砖的使用可以更好地管理水资源，通过减少径流和促进地下水补给，使表面更加环保。

LCIMethodAndAllocation.deviationsFromLCIMethodApproaches: ReCiPe midpoint (H) model is applied in this study.
本研究采用了 ReCiPe midpoint（H）模型。

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.dataSelectionAndCombinationPrinciples: In this study, the production energy consumption of concrete pavement brick and permeable brick as well as the relevant data of all kinds of raw materials and energy input and exhaust emissions are collected from Jinan Shunde Cement Products Co. Ltd. Shandong Province.
本研究从济南顺德水泥制品有限公司收集了混凝土路面砖和透水砖的生产能耗以及各种原材料、能源投入和废气排放的相关数据。济南顺德水泥制品有限公司 山东省。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: Yuan, X. et al. Environmental and economic impacts assessment of concrete pavement brick and permeable brick production process - A case study in China. Journal of Cleaner Production 171, 198–208 (2018).

Yuan, X. et al. Environmental and economic impacts assessment of concrete pavement brick and permeable brick production process - A case study in China. Journal of Cleaner Production 171, 198–208 (2018).

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.samplingProcedure: Most data of raw materials, energy input and waste discharge were collected from the site investigation of manufacturer. Water reducer is also called water reducing agent, whose chemical constituents is the sodium salt of the sulfonate formaldehyde condensation
原材料、能源投入和废物排放的大部分数据都是从生产厂家的现场调查中收集的。减水剂，其化学成分是磺酸钠盐的甲醛缩合物
dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: When utilizing the LCA data from the given study, pay close attention to the production energy consumption figures of concrete pavement and permeable bricks. Make sure to account for all inputs including raw materials and energy, as well as outputs such as waste and exhaust emissions. The sensitivity analysis should be noted, whereby changes in inputs and outputs by more than 5% in key processes must be considered. The ReCiPe midpoint (H) model must be applied for impact assessment. The functional unit should be regarded as 1m2 of brick product area for any comparisons or analyses carried out.
使用给定研究的LCA数据时，应密切注意混凝土路面砖和透水砖的生产能耗数据。确保计入所有输入，包括原材料和能源，以及输出，如废物和废气排放。应注意敏感性分析，关键工序中输入和输出变化超过5%必须考虑。对于影响评估必须应用 ReCiPe midpoint (H) 模型。在进行任何比较或分析时，应将功能单位视为1m²砖产品区域。

completeness.common:other: In this research, the sensitivity analysis was carried out according to the principle of 5% variation for input and output in the change of key processes.
在本研究中，根据关键工序变化中输入和输出变化 5%的原则进行了敏感性分析。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses
